TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingHandler

summary.span: 指示實作的物件必須由遠端基礎結構來告知關於物件和 Proxy 的封送處理、解封送處理 (Unmarshaling) 和中斷連接。

span.span: Indicates that the implementing object must be notified of marshaling, unmarshaling, and disconnection of objects and proxies by the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個物件都已向物件或在目前的 proxy 時，由遠端呼叫封送處理、 marshaling，或已中斷連線。Every object that is registered with is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected. 請注意，只有物件可以中斷連線。Note that only objects can be disconnected. 發生例外狀況時中斷連線的 proxy 上呼叫。An exception is thrown when disconnect is called on a proxy. > [!NOTE] > 此介面可讓連結要求。This interface makes a link demand. 如果立即呼叫端會透過介面的參考呼叫，而且沒有基礎結構權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法介面，以接收來自遠端基礎結構的通知。The following code example shows how to implement the methods of the interface to receive notifications from the remoting infrastructure. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面。The following code example shows how to implement this interface. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/trackinghandler.cs#30)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何在伺服器上實作這個介面。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a server. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/server.cs#20)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何在上述程式碼範例中伺服器的用戶端上實作這個介面。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a client for the server in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示所使用的伺服器和用戶端的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/remoteservice.cs#10)]

permission.span: 針對使用基礎結構程式碼執行作業。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectedObject(object obj) cil managed

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經自其 Proxy 中斷連接。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been disconnected from its proxy.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個方法。The following code example shows how to implement this method. 此程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the interface. MemberSignature.Value: public void MarshaledObject (object obj, System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef or);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MarshaledObject(object obj, class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef or) cil managed
Public Sub MarshaledObject (obj As Object, or As ObjRef)
public: void MarshaledObject(System::Object ^ obj, System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjRef ^ or);
abstract member MarshaledObject : obj * System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef -> unit

span.span: The object that has been marshaled.

param.name: or
param.span: 自封送處理產生而且代表指定物件的 。

span.span: The that results from marshaling and represents the specified object.

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經被封送處理。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been marshaled.

summary.span: 告知目前執行個體，物件已經解除封送處理。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been unmarshaled.
